scripts.start: npm run build-css && concurrently --kill-others "npm run serve" "npm run sass-watch"
scripts.serve: env $(cat .env | xargs) budo src/index.js:bundle.js --pushstate --dir=public --live -- -t [ babelify --presets [ "@babel/preset-env" ] ] -t [ envify --NODE_ENV development ] -dv
scripts.build: npm run build-js && npm run build-css
scripts.build-js: browserify -p bundle-collapser/plugin src/index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ "@babel/preset-env" ] ] -t envify -g unassertify | uglifyjs -mc > public/bundle.js
